main event: A civilian observed a round object approximately 5 inches in diameter emitting a bright blue light at 1930 hours on 10 December 1957.
interesting points: The object dropped at an angle from south to north and disappeared behind mountains.,The observation lasted only 1 or 2 seconds.,The observer was stopped for a red light when they saw the object.,The object was initially thought to be a meteor.,The report concluded that it was probably an astronomical meteor.
sighted object: round object with a bright blue light
